author: luehe
msg: Ignore missing JAR files when scanning TLDs
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 's1ap8_i1'.

author: remm
msg: - Make the code clearer as far as resource cleanup is concerned.

author: kinman
msg: - Put generate .class files in packages that mirror JSP file heirachy.
- Refactor some codes in Jspc and JspCompilationContext to shared more code.
WARNING: All JSP pages need to be recompiled!

author: luehe
msg: Relaxed requirement that <root> element in JSP document must have
"jsp" prefix. It may have any index and will still be considered a JSP
document, as long as its index is bound to the JSP namespace
This is in line with the latest JSP 2.0 spec clarification.
